content: in this legal case the court in benevento has made a final ruling regarding the dissolution of a community inheritance the deceased person had interestbearing postal vouchers and the court determined that the value of these vouchers should be divided among the heirs the court rejected a request to freeze a share of the inheritance due to the alleged inability of one of the heirs to make decisions regarding their health stating that the heir was capable of participating in the division the court discussed the criteria for suspending the division of the inheritance and awarded costs based on the outcome of the case the court declared the dissolution of the inheritance community and determined the distribution of the assets the court authorized poste italiane spa to make the payment to the entitled individuals the court also ordered one of the heirs to pay the court costs and additional expenses the ruling was made on february 17 2018
